title: Star Force: Nemesis
description: Training continues with new and varied combat 'Challenges' being passed by Paul and the other elite trainees far faster than the Star Force trainers anticipated...that is, until a new, random element is added that quickly becomes their bane, providing the best the planet has to offer with their greatest challenge yet."Nemesis" is the third episode in the series.Word Count: 23,500
author: Aer-ki Jyr
